title: Allow App name changed in app store
body: isn't it better to allow developers to change their app name inside app store according to different language and culture? currently it supposes to be reading all names from some dll files in the xap bundle,(if you have support for different languages) but it failed, and the name displayed in app store can actually harm the ranking of the app.  creating those dlls is a pain in the xxx .

comments.body: I would be nice to be able to exchange primary and secondary name of an app in the store.
I think you should localize your app for this feature.
